system.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.urban-shadows-pbta.play-materials.Item.WG1rY3dZ7eA0fB6c]{refuse to honor a Debt} by fast-talking your way out of the obligation, roll with MIND instead of the difference in Status.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: On a miss, you can't avoid the noose: either honor the Debt in full or erase all the Debts owed to you by their Circle and take a -1 ongoing to Status with their Circle until after time passes.

weak-hit.label: Weak Hit
weak-hit.value:
On a hit, you weasel out of the obligation for now, but you still owe the Debt. On a 7-9, you owe them an additional Debt or mark corruption, your choice.

On a hit—in addition to the normal effects—mark your creditor's Circle as though you had honored the Debt.

strong-hit.label: Strong Hit
strong-hit.value:
On a hit, you weasel out of the obligation for now, but you still owe the Debt.

On a hit—in addition to the normal effects—mark your creditor's Circle as though you had honored the Debt.
